sub_title: Sparking change through research, education & innovation
summary: Helping people make a lasting positive impact on the world is my drive. In my 4+ years of professional experience, I have done so by doing research, educating children and peers and facilitating human-centered innovation – all through the lens of social and climate justice.

volunteer_experiences.description: Giving speeches on personal leadership, providing workshops, evaluating the course.

Reading together, having conversations and going on small excursions to enhance mastery of the Dutch language. Reducing the fear of interaction with others, boosting the mentees' participation in society.

Helped plan an exchange with Middlesex University London with the aim of providing insight in international study options for students. This committee was the first to succeed in having the participants from abroad visit Rotterdam too.
